document: <sentence id="s1" text="We have been investigating the pancreas specific transcription factor, 1a cre-recombinase; blood vessel morphogenesis-stop-blood vessel morphogenesis- Kristen rat sarcoma, glycine to aspartic acid at the 12 codon (Ptf1acre/+;LSL-KrasG12D/+) mouse strain as a model of human pancreatic cancer.">
